fullContent: Home› CardUno OnlineBy OnlineGames.ioMake Game Full ScreenUno Online, one of the most-played card games, is now on your device with a multiplayer option. Green, blue, yellow, and red. These four colors will make your day. It's a great pass time when you are bored in school, at work, or on the road.In the beginning, each player gets dealt with 7 random cards from a shuffled deck of 108 cards. You will be playing cards in turns. The aim is to get rid of all the cards in your hand before anyone does.We have explained all you must know before playing Uno Online below. If it seems complicated, don't worry! The best way to learn card games is through playing them.How to Play Uno Online?There are number cards, making most of the deck, action cards and wild cards. Number cards have a face value of 0 to 9.You will be dealt 7 cards at first.You have to get rid of all cards in your hand to win the game.The card you play must match the last card placed down in number, color, or symbol.You must draw a random card from the draw pile if you do not have a card matching one of these criteria.Action Cards of Uno OnlineThere are 3 types of action cards: Draw 2, reverse and skip. Draw 2: The next player gets 2 cards from the draw pile, and they skip their turn. Reverse: Reverses the direction of the game wise. For example, if you are playing in clockwise rotation, it reverses into counter-clockwise.Skip: The next player misses their turnWild Cards of Uno OnlineThere are 2 types of wild cards. You can use wild cards anytime in the game. You don't have to match wild cards with the last card played.Wild card: this will allow the player to choose what color to play on.Wild draw 4: The player decides the next color to play on and makes the next player draw 4 cards.Learn More About UNO OnlineWhen was UNO invented?Uno is not as old as other classic card games. The game was invented in 1971 by Merle Robbins in Ohio.How many cards are there in UNO?In a typical UNO deck, there are 108 cards and four colors. Each color has 19 cards, summing up to 76 number cards. Also, 24 action cards and 8 wild cards are in a Four Colors deck.Can I play Uno Online on mobile?Yes, you can play Uno Online on mobile without downloading any files on OnlineGames.io.Games Like Uno OnlineFour Colors is a card game that is very similar to Uno Online.
